title: What Our Students Say
description: Our students are at the heart of everything we do. Hear from those who have experienced our programs and see how our courses have helped them excel in their educational and career journeys. Their success stories are a testament to the impact we strive to make every day

testimonials.quote: I had an enriching experience as an intern at Baoiam Innovations Private Limited, where I was met with supportive mentors and engaging projects, fostering both personal and professional growth.
testimonials.name: Atharv Ingale

testimonials.quote: Had a wonderful experience at Baoiam. Learnt a lot of skills like leadership and time-management. Made really good connections and got guidance from qualified mentors.
testimonials.name: Aishwarya Kamble

testimonials.quote: A good experience of learning various skills that are necessary for opting for any organisation. Great work culture with supportive colleagues and team members with constant mentor guidance.
testimonials.name: Kaushiki Dey
